content.rendered:
[mk_page_section][vc_column width=”3/4″][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][vc_column_text]

[/vc_column_text][mk_fancy_title tag_name=”h3″ color=”#777777″ size=”30″ font_weight=”300″ font_family=”none” align=”center”]Order Cleaning Equipment Online[/mk_fancy_title][vc_column_text]

From small offices to large industrial facilities, Mr. Janitorial Supplies represents a number of manufacturers that will have the right machine for your specific needs.  Our equipment specialists can recommend cost effective cleaning equipment that increases productivity and reduces the cost of ownership.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column visibility=”hidden-sm” width=”1/4″][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][mk_fancy_title tag_name=”h3″ color=”#777777″ size=”30″ font_weight=”300″ font_family=”none”]Our Products[/mk_fancy_title][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text align=”center”]
